alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued October 07 at 6:16AM AKDT until October 07 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas will flood and significant erosion is expected. Damage to fish or hunting camps along the coast will occur. Some critical infrastructure may be inundated. In Shishmaref, flooding is possible along low lying areas along the lagoon and the beach and significant erosion is expected on the ocean side. In Kivalina, flooding is expected along the lagoon, and significant erosion and possible flooding will occur along the ocean side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are expected to rise to 4 feet above normal high tide line about noon today. The highest water levels are expected early this afternoon, then falling this evening. Strong southwest winds will turn west and decrease this afternoon.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
